Stop-loss strategy: Set stop loss at 13.05 (10% below current price) and adjust as the stock price moves upward, maintaining a 10% trailing stop loss.
Trailing stop loss strategy with a 10% stop loss level, and sell if the stock price falls below the 50-day moving average or if ROE or ROA declines significantly.
Set stop loss at 13.05 NTD, criteria: if the stock price falls below 13.05 NTD or if ROE decreases below -5%
Trailing stop loss with a 10% stop loss threshold and a 5% trailing increment
Trailing stop loss with a 10% drop from the highest price since buying, or if the quarterly EPS drops below -1.0
